problem_text_cn: 如图,PA切⊙O于点A,PB切⊙O于点B,CD切⊙O于E,若∠APB=50°,则∠COD的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, PB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, CD is tangent to ⊙O at E, if ∠APB = N_0, then the degree of ∠COD is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OA,OB,OE,∵PA、PB、CD分别切⊙O于A、B、E,∴∠AOC=∠EOC,同理∠BOD=∠DOE,∴∠COD=∠COE+∠DOE=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB,∵∠APB=50°,∴∠AOB=130°,∴∠COD=65°．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了切线的性质及其应用问题,解题的关键是作辅助线,灵活运用切线的性质来分析、判断、推理或解答．
